episodes.title: Escaping the Grip  Survivors Expose the Truth About Religious Cults & Finding Faith Part 2
episodes.description:
In this powerful episode of Let Glory Shine, Martha sits down with author and survivor Peter Young to expose the hidden, often unspoken realities of religious cults, and to share the truth about what it takes to break free, rebuild your identity, and rediscover faith after spiritual trauma.
Martha opens up about growing up in a cult in Shawano, Wisconsin, and the impact it had on her life, identity, and relationship with God. Peter shares his gripping story of being pulled into a small, secretive religious group led by “Uncle Robert,” where manipulation, isolation, and twisted scripture shaped nearly two decades of his life.
Together, they shine a light on:
 How cult brainwashing actually works
 The moment each realized they needed to escape
 The long-term effects of spiritual and emotional abuse
 Why many survivors walk away from God, and how Peter found faith again
 Steps toward healing, reclaiming your voice, and breaking generational cycles
If you are a survivor, a supporter, or someone curious about the realities behind religious control, this conversation offers truth, hope, and the reminder that freedom is possible and faith can be restored.
Peter’s Book: Stop The Tall Man, Save The Tiger
Available on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Stop-Tall-Man-Save-Tiger-ebook/dp/B0BX4PPM3C

episodes.title: LET GLORY SHINE: When Stories Collide: A Cult Survivor Reunion with Orpah Sindt
episodes.description:
In this deeply moving episode of Let Glory Shine, host Martha Glory Kartaoui sits down with a familiar face from her past, Orpah Sindt, a fellow survivor from the same cult that shaped much of their early lives. For the first time on camera, these two courageous women open up about their individual journeys through trauma, indoctrination, and spiritual abuse, and what it meant to finally reunite in Dallas just one month ago after years of separation.

Orpah shares her own raw testimony, revealing the emotional toll of her experience and the strength it took to reclaim her voice. Together, they explore the complexities of healing, the power of being seen, and what happens when two survivors come full circle in truth and transformation.

This is more than a conversation. It’s a divine intersection. A sacred homecoming.

Let Glory Shine...a light in the darkness for every Battle Angel who has ever felt alone in their pain. Don’t miss this unforgettable episode.
